attributes.action: Nhs need to make gluten free foods available to those who are intolerant
attributes.additional_details: I have battled for yes with my belly undiagnosed by the nhs I have recently been diagnosed with gluten lactose intolerance and to hear that this is low priority and being cut worry me intensely please sign the petition to help those who need thsee products.
attributes.background: Patients who suffer from gluten intolerance need this to live with the last petition being rejected I would like you to conside not banning this on the nhs

rejection.details:
This is a decision for local Clinical Commissioning Groups, not the Government or Parliament. Many local CCGs do offer gluten free staples on prescription already.

You could start a new petition calling for CCGs to be required to fund the provision of gluten free staples on prescription.
